Uses of Class
htsjdk.samtools.SamReaderFactory

  • Packages that use SamReaderFactory 
    Package Description
    htsjdk.samtools  

    • Uses of SamReaderFactory in htsjdk.samtools

      Methods in htsjdk.samtools that return SamReaderFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.disable(SamReaderFactory.Option... options)
      Disables the provided SamReaderFactory.Options, then returns itself.
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.enable(SamReaderFactory.Option... options)
      Enables the provided SamReaderFactory.Options, then returns itself.
      static SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.make()
      Creates an "empty" factory with no enabled SamReaderFactory.Options, ValidationStringency.DEFAULT_STRINGENCY, and DefaultSAMRecordFactory.
      static SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.makeDefault()
      Creates a copy of the default SamReaderFactory.
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.referenceSequence(java.io.File referenceSequence)
      Sets the specified reference sequence *
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.referenceSource(CRAMReferenceSource referenceSequence)
      Sets the specified reference sequence *
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.samRecordFactory(SAMRecordFactory samRecordFactory)
      Set this factory's SAMRecordFactory to the provided one, then returns itself.
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.setOption(SamReaderFactory.Option option, boolean value)
      Sets a specific Option to a boolean value.
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.setUseAsyncIo(boolean asynchronousIO)
      Set whether readers created by this factory will use asynchronous IO.
      abstract SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.validationStringency(ValidationStringency validationStringency)
      Set this factory's ValidationStringency to the provided one, then returns itself.
